? Everybody in one 10-man fantasy-football league in Omaha agreed with Spud Mann's suggestion to tattoo the last-place finisher with art of the league champion's choosing. Im Gesamtjahr 2010 verdiente Google unterm Strich 8,5 Milliarden Dollar. Doch Google kann das Geld gar nicht so schnell ausgeben, wie es hereinkommt. In der Kasse liegen mittlerweile 35 Milliarden Dollar. Wir hatten ein starkes Quartal und ein starkes Jahr , sagte Eric Schmidt . "Der Ausblick ist vielversprechend." . Richard Hunter didn't get a response from the NFL star. But he did get a surprise at the same event when Mayor Tom Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway presented Michael Vick with a key to the city. People are going to think that the city- in the week that the eyes of the world were on us- gave the key to the city to a sociopath like that, Richard Hunter said. On Monday, Dwaine Caraway explained that he wanted to show children at the event they can reset their lives in the right direction after bad decisions like the ones Michael Vick made. "

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1.
